about.subtitle: THE STORY BEHIND
about.title: Born from Fire & Sea
about.p1: Each piece in our collection begins its journey in the volcanic landscape of Santorini, where ancient eruptions shaped the earth into something extraordinary. These precious stones come from the island's unique geological formations.
about.p2: During my visits to Greece, I work with a trusted artisan who carefully selects each volcanic stone for its unique character—the subtle variations in color, the smooth texture shaped by centuries of natural elements. They expertly craft these authentic Santorini stones into beautiful beads, which are then delivered to my studio in Germany where the magic happens.
about.p3: Every bracelet and necklace is handcrafted with intention, combining traditional techniques with contemporary design. The result is jewelry that connects you to the raw beauty of Santorini while adding elegance to your everyday moments.
about.quote: Bringing Santorini's volcanic beauty to life, one piece at a time.
